full_summary:
=====================================

**Bid Solicitation Number**
---------------------------

* Solicitation Number: WS3837505581
* Reference Number: WS3837505581-Doc3865452138

**Proposal Opportunity**
----------------------

The Government of Canada is seeking a proposal for the Development of an effective mRNA-Based African Swine Fever Vaccine that can differentiate vaccinated from infected animals.

**Request for Proposal**
----------------------

The Canadian Food Inspection Agency has a requirement for the development of a vaccine that can effectively detect and differentiate vaccinated animals from those infected with African Swine Fever Virus.

**Objective**
------------

The successful proposal will involve generating an mRNA vaccine that expresses 15 different antigens of ASFV and testing them in vaccination-challenge experiments at the National Centre for Foreign Animal disease (NCFAD), Winnipeg, Canada.

**Contract Information**
----------------------

* Expected contract start date: Not specified
* Expected contract end date: December 31, 2023
* Period of contract: Approximately 12 months

**Tender Status**
----------------

The bid solicitation is CLOSED and NO LONGER ACCEPTING PROPOSALS.

**Contact Information**
--------------------

For more information on this solicitation, please contact Lorraine Jenkinson at lorraine.jenkinson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca or visit the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15373314?extsite=MTUzNzMzMTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: All proposals must be submitted by March 9, 2023 at 14:00 EDT.
